page.title: 06SPORTS FACILITIES
page.content:
The sports facilities in our block are very good.There's lots of football pitches, hockey pitches and rugby pitches. There is also an all weather court lit by flood lights. There are two large cricket pitches. There is a large sports hall to practice athletics and that is just at Les Quennevais. There is also a cycle track. There is a yachting club and an athletics club which runs all the time. Also at les Quennevais is a jogging club and a boxing club. You can practice your sports and you can join a club at the sports hall. So all in all our block has the best sports facilities in Jersey.
Darren A'Court
